origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceDataAPI.fetch_financial_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves financial data for a specific sector based on the data type and the time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector for which financial data is requested, e.g., healthcare, technology.'}, {'name': 'dataType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial data, e.g., funding, revenue.'}, {'name': 'timePeriod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for the data, e.g., Q1_2023, FY_2022.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'financialData', 'description': 'The financial data for the requested sector and time period.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceDataAPI.fetch_financial_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'healthcare', 'dataType'是'funding', 'timePeriod'是'Q1_2023'.
